column5: hey guys im looking for a John Spahr centerpin reel anyone know where i can find one in the GTA? and the price they go for? im assuming it might be 400+ since its not a mass production float reel and anyone out there own one or play with one before?  thanks.
You might be better to ask your question here.............   http://www.floatfishing.net/  or here............  http://www.questoutdoors.net/phpBB2/
THERES A FEW GUYS ON THE FLOATBOARD THAT RUN THEM!!!
I am also looking for one! I think its best to buy them from a store I think simcoe bait and tackle carries them.
